walikada bandhanagaraye uthsawaya janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathi athara adhikarana amathini thalatha athukorala mahathmiyada ekwuwaya. 71 karallata kisidu sambandhayak nathiwa thama dirgha kalayak niraparade siragathawima pilibandawa sihipath karamin sanwedi kathawakda kala janadhipathiwaraya edina nidahasa labu sirakaruwangen illimakda kale idiriyata yahapath jiwithayak gewana lesaya.

ee sorun rajawaru alwa noyek kam katolu karawath, kasa walin thalawath, wewal walin thalawath, dekata palu (derin pamana) danduwalin thalawath, athda kapath, payada kapath athpa siyallamath kapath, kanath kapath nasayath kapath, kan nasath kapath, bilangathalika (is kabala galawa molaya uthurawamin karana) nam wadhaya karath, sankha mundika (hise kes ha sama galawa boralu la ula sudu kirima) nam wadhaya dethi, rahu mukha (anduwen kata arawa ehi thula gini dalwima) nam wadhaya deth, jothi malika (shariraya thel redi walin wela gini dalwima) nam dhaya deth, haththapajejathika (athdeke thel redi wela gini dalwima) nam wadhaya deth, eraka waththika (bellehi patan aswataya dakwa hama galawa ohu lawa pagawima) nam wadhaya deth.
